DataElement.preferredName: RT Fraction Scheme Planned Fractionation Quantity Integer Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Total number of treatments (Fractions) prescribed for current Fraction Group.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Fractionation Scheme Planned Fractionation Quantity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days._Scheme; an elaborate and systematic plan of action._To devise, contrive, or form in design._Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.:Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.:Scheme; an elaborate and systematic plan of action.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
Radiation therapy in which the total dose delivered is divided into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.
An elaborate and systematic plan of action.

Property.preferredDefinition: Planned; devised, contrived, or formed in design.:Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.
Radiation therapy in which the total dose delivered is divided into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/18/19 jk DICOM CDE; Released per qtrly metric review.  11/20/13 created for a Norton CC DICOM RT study. jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: IS: A string of characters representing an Integer in base-10 (decimal), shall contain only the listed characters (0-9, +,-). [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::12:A sequence of 8 bits processed as a single unit of information.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A sequence of 8 bits processed as a single unit of information.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/9/13 changed data type to number for reuse in CRF Standard. jc  1/6/07-2006 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6
